about_the_game:
Satellite odyssey - a series of adventure games about human exploration of space.

Welcome, dear explorer, to Europa — the jewel among Jupiter's moons, a symbol of humanity's unwavering will to reach for the stars. Here, on this frozen wasteland, we built a base that serves as a beacon of our perseverance and scientific brilliance. But as is often the case, a place created for discovery can conceal the unimaginable.

In Satellite Odyssey: Jupiter, you will open the doors to a dark and restless world where hope intersects with danger. You will face not only revelations but trials, where every step you take matters.

- Unique dynamic of two heroes: Experience the synergy of skills between a man and his loyal dog. Use their individual abilities to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles.

- A narrative that delves into the depths of human nature: This base is not just a settlement; it is a battleground for ideas, fears, and ambitions. Explore its secrets and prepare for an encounter with the unknown.

- Battles that require intellect and resolve: Use the arsenal of tools found on the base to fend off enemies, or develop alternative strategies to avoid direct combat. Every choice matters.

- Retrofuturism aesthetic: A world where technology and ambitious dreams of the future intertwine, creating a unique atmosphere.

- Rich atmosphere: We used Steam Audio technology so that every sound in the game feels immersive from all directions. Muted noises, echoes in metal corridors, and the vibrations of machines enhance the experience. Every whisper and rustle not only brings the world to life but also keeps you on edge.

- Silent space: The beautiful and harsh face of the universe simultaneously entices and warns: its mysteries are far from friendly. But it is in this challenge that our true purpose lies, is it not?

Are you ready, brave explorer, to uncover what really happened on this distant outpost of humanity? Or will you become just another link in its chain of mysteries? Europa awaits your answer.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes:
Dead bodies (scattered throughout the locations).
Profanity (the main character occasionally uses strong language).
Smoking and alcohol consumption (occurs in cutscenes).
The game includes scenes of violence and cruelty, along with instances of strong language and the consumption of alcohol or tobacco.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4670, AMD Ryzen 3 2300U or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060, Radeon RX 5600 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800K, AMD Ryzen 5 PRO 1600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 3080, Radeon RX 6800 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Satellite Odyssey: Jupiter — a sci-fi horror with survival elements. Explore Europa, and unravel its dark secrets. The game combines exploration, puzzles, and combat with a unique dynamic of two heroes — a man and his loyal dog. Use their abilities to overcome obstacles and survive.
